document_data.mainbody:
Swiresy shoes were magical boots that were likely created in tribute to the infamous diminutive vaulting thief named Lupperdiddle Swires.
The wearer of these boots became an expert vaulter, making their jumps  longer and higher. Additionally, they magically improved the wearers skills in acrobatics.
As of the , Swiresy shoes were in possession of Grat, a merchant of Cult of the Absolute who traded at the Shattered Sanctum. The boots were among many other spoils of cultist raids on the communities and locations in the Chionthar Vallery.
